text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'za kefo avu'ava'ma hu'naza zante ha' vahe'mo'za eme zamahe'za kina ome huzmante'naze hu'za, ru mopafi vahe'mo'za ke'za antahi'za hugahaze. Na'ankure zamagra kefo avu'ava nehu'za, Nagri namagera onte'nagu navugosa ru krahe hu'na namefi hunezmi'na ha' vahe'mokizmi zamazampi zamavarentogeno, bainati kazinteti zamahehana hu'naze.
